imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Warm minimalist logo mark: abstract photo frame + heart/leaf motif, flat vector style, transparent background (family-memories-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Soft illustrated hero scene: living-room wall with a photo collage, warm neutral palette, subtle grain texture (family-memories-hero.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a family memories app where authenticated users can add and browse shared memories.
Support an optional photo per memory: allow users to upload an image in the frontend and store/retrieve it via the backend with clear size/type limits.
Build a frontend UX for creating, viewing, and organizing memories: timeline/gallery list, memory detail view, and an ‘Add Memory’ form.
Define and apply a coherent visual theme appropriate for a family memories product, using Tailwind + shadcn components, and enforce it consistently across all pages.
Add basic onboarding UX around authentication: a landing state for signed-out users and a clear call-to-action to sign in.
Provide minimal safety and moderation controls: allow authors to edit/delete their own memories and prevent unauthenticated writes.
Add generated static brand assets and display them in the UI (placed under frontend/public/assets/generated), without routing these assets through the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an app for sharing family memories.
Implement backend data models and stable persistence for memories, including CRUD operations exposed via canister methods.

projectName: Family Memories Sharing App (Internet Identity + Memory Timeline)
